channel.title: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help
channel.description:
Hello.
Thanks for reading this.
Ok so i have problems with connecting from another computer to my server. From the computer that is running the server, it runs fine. All i need to do is get it to be able to play from any1's computer.
I have it based off of Xscape....
It works fine on the computer with the server... like i changed my rights on my character and everything. How do i make it so other people can play on it. I tried to use Utorrent but that didnt work. Help please.
Its called *.no-ip.org
Thanks
Delicious

item.title: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

Teh moose, thats a good idea lol… thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 01:33:06 pm[/size][hr]O but i dont know which one to use and when i do run>cmd>ipconfig it doesnt work… so would i use my LAN or WAN ip?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 01:41:31 pm[/size][hr]Omg just thought of something…

I have two desktop conputers in my house connected on the same router in the same room.

Would that matter if i am useing the newest computer, which would mean the older one is the main computer or something?

Would i need to run the server on the other computer?

Read full topic
item.source: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help

item.title: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Just try having people connect to the nubers of your ip instead of the no-ip, thats what I had to do for a while…

Read full topic

item.source: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help

item.title: Help... Im almost done with my server....need final connection help
item.dc:creator: @da_man1 da man1
item.description:
@da_man1 wrote:

delicious:

Its called *.no-ip.org

Advertisment. You have to run ur server (DUH?) and you must set up a no-ip. url=http://no-ip.com[/url] And you need to portforward. Start->Run…->Type cmd-> then type ipconfig. Look at you IP address. Then type it at your address bar and login then portforward.

Read full topic
